attributes.action: Subsidise rail travel for University Students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current 'Young Persons Railcard' for under 25's is not valid during peak time, leaving students to pay full fare for getting to Uni in the mornings. Currently I must pay £14.50 to travel each day, which is terribly expensive considering my only income is a student loan. College students get a council discount, so why shouldn't Uni students.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
